00076                 private function generate_error($code)
00077                 {
00078                         $desc = self::$descriptions[$code];
00079                         header("HTTP/1.1 $code $desc");
00080                         if (isset($_SESSION['error_processed']))
00081                         {
00082                                 unset($_SESSION['error_processed']);
00083                                 return;
00084                         }
00085                         if ($code == 404)
00086                         {
00087                                 return;
00088                         }
00089                         $error = new ServerError(array('code' => $code,
00090                                 'description' => var_export($_SERVER, TRUE),
00091                                 'occurred_at' => date('Y-m-d H:i:s')));
00092                         $error->save();
00093                 }
00094         }
